page.title: 09VENMOOR FARM , WOODBURY
page.content: A group from school visited{Venmoor {Farm,}which is a tenant farm.The farm is owned by{Clinton Estates}but the tenants are the,House family.{The farm {is 250 acres}with 60 acres for summer keep.It is a{dairy farm}with 80% British Friesians and 20% Holstein { There are 150 cattle altogether}but some heifers are exported to Portugal from Southampton,to improve Portugal's dairy stock.20 acres of maize are also grown,it is used to feed the cattle along with cake,which is bought from Marsh Barton.The{farm has computerised {feeding systems}which are used to put less stress on the cattle,this in turn keeps the{milk yield at about 6600 {litres per head per year.}the cows are milked in a{Herringbone milking {parlour.}The milk is kept in a 850 gallon storage tank.
